jd: Greetings..!! My name is Akshat, and I am a Technical Recruiter at Tanisha Systems Inc. Tanisha Systems Inc is a global contingency staffing firm servicing. We have an excellent job opportunity with one of our clients. Role: Pega DeveloperLocation: Tampa, FL – Only Local –3 Day onsite per weekExperience: 9+YearsType: ContractJob Description:Must Have:Pega 8.x design, development and integration experienceHands on experience with Dev Studio for Workflows, UI , Business Rules, Routing, Security and IntegrationsSmart Investigate framework experience or financial services framework experienceGood understanding of Pega AI/ML , GenAI , NLP capabilities for automation and straight through processing implementationsAbility to create multiple design options with pros and cons for implementation roadmapUnderstanding of Pega application deployment options, dev-ops, ecosystem integration with Message Queues and REST/SOAP callsDomain understanding on Payments, Payment investigations, financial servicesAbility to lead team, review code and design with good grip on project timelines and estimates to support PM / Scrum mastersTeam player with good client facing skills Good To Have:Good understanding of cloud, performance troubleshooting , deployment architectureProcess improvement and process optimization experienceFunctional depth in ISO 20022 MX and MT messages
